definitions: a person in a group who becomes separated from the others, typically because of moving more slowly

examples.text: a few stragglers lingered, talking as they slipped on their coats
we can expect to see a flow of legal pressures pushing stragglers towards sustainability

shortDefinitions: person in group who becomes separated from others

definitions: something that grows or spreads irregularly or apart from others of its kind

examples.text: these small trees are the remnant stragglers of their species
I use wax on my chin and lip about once a week, and pluck stragglers in between
